title: Greece: Attacks on Boats Risk Migrant Lives (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) ( Athens ) â€“ Armed masked men have been disabling boats carrying migrants and asylum seekers in the Aegean Sea and pushing them back to Turkish waters, Human Rights Watch said today. Human Rights Watch spoke
